about_the_game:
Cool summer breeze, fluffy clouds and singing birds. What could be more beautiful?

— that's what Marfa the cat thought, basking in the sun on the windowsill of the Artist's house.

Who is an Artist? This is Marfa's owner. He works hard, but not only on his paintings, but also... on a mysterious plan. What is this plan? — you may ask. The answer to this question is what the kitty Marfa is looking for.

The path to the solution will turn the life of a simple home cat upside down, open up a new mysteriously scary world ...

What kind of world is this, what secrets the city hides and why the Artist fails to carry out his plan - that's what you have to find out...

You will have to look at the city with the big eyes of a charming cat, feel both the beauty of the world and look at it through a terrifying prism, learn a lot of new things, untangle a tangle of secrets and riddles and help the Artist bring to life the plan of an ideal city!

They are waiting for you:

  • Exciting puzzles in the Point-and-Click quest genre;

  • Interesting tasks and important cat chores;

  • A fascinating story and incredible adventures;

  • New knowledge and amazing facts;

  • Aerial watercolor painting

  • And, of course, a very cute cat Marfa!

CREATED WITH THE SUPPORT OF THE INNOVATION PROMOTION FUND
